Clinton blasted Trump as a "puppet" of Putin and directly called on him to condemn what she said was a Russian effort to use cyberattacks to influence the election in her opponent's favor.

Clinton called Trump Putin's puppet     When Trump's ties to Russia and Russian President Vladimir Putin came up, this happened:  CLINTON: Well, that's because [Putin would] rather have a puppet as president.
She called him a puppet of Vladimir Putin. His response? "No, you're the puppet. "
"That's because he would rather have a puppet as president of the United States," Clinton said, implying that Putin wanted Trump to win the election. "No puppet.
"That's because he'd rather have a puppet as president," Clinton shot back. "You're the puppet!" Trump replied. The tone grew similarly tense during a discussion on the economy.
